---
name: "Event Scheduling and Announcements"
about: "Feature request for scheduling and announcing club events."
title: "[Feature] Event Scheduling and Announcements"
labels: [enhancement]
---

## Feature Description
Provide a calendar or event scheduling system for clubs to announce upcoming activities, meetings, or events. Members should receive notifications or reminders for scheduled events.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Admins can create, update, and delete events
- Members can view upcoming events in a calendar or list
- Notification/reminder system for events

## Additional Notes
Consider integration with email or in-app notifications.
